lead_paragraph: PICKUS--Robert, who devoted his life to developing non-violent alternatives to war, died on January 26 in St. Helena, CA. He was 92. He is survived by his wife, Sara, his sons Joshua and Noah, and his grandchildren Linkon, Micah, Reed and Mira. 1/3
